upload.title: Upload files
upload.description: Upload files to your knowledge base
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select

unsupportedFileType.title: Unsupported File Type
unsupportedFileType.description: The file type you selected is not supported.

fileTooLarge.title: File Too Large
fileTooLarge.description: The file exceeds the maximum size limit of {{maxSize}}.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: Manage your uploaded files and documents

dialogs.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{filename}}"? This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.bulkDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} document(s)? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove all selected files from your knowledge base.

empty.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
empty.uploadPrompt: Upload your knowledge articles to unlock instant answers from RITA
